elements.name: _balances[seller] = _balances[seller].sub(tokenAmount,sender does not have this amount to sell)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in SurgeToken.sell(uint256) (SurgeToken.sol#577-602):
	External calls:
	- (successful) = address(seller).call{gas: 40000,value: amountBNB}() (SurgeToken.sol#591)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _balances[seller] = _balances[seller].sub(tokenAmount,sender does not have this amount to sell) (SurgeToken.sol#594)
	SurgeToken._balances (SurgeToken.sol#484) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- SurgeToken._transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (SurgeToken.sol#535-551)
	- SurgeToken.balanceOf(address) (SurgeToken.sol#504)
	- SurgeToken.constructor() (SurgeToken.sol#496-501)
	- SurgeToken.getValueOfHoldings(address) (SurgeToken.sol#620-622)
	- SurgeToken.mint(address,uint256) (SurgeToken.sol#610-613)
	- _totalSupply = _totalSupply.sub(tokenAmount) (SurgeToken.sol#596)
	SurgeToken._totalSupply (SurgeToken.sol#482) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- SurgeToken._transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (SurgeToken.sol#535-551)
	- SurgeToken.calculatePrice() (SurgeToken.sol#605-607)
	- SurgeToken.constructor() (SurgeToken.sol#496-501)
	- SurgeToken.mint(address,uint256) (SurgeToken.sol#610-613)
	- SurgeToken.purchase(address,uint256) (SurgeToken.sol#554-574)
	- SurgeToken.totalSupply() (SurgeToken.sol#503)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [SurgeToken.sell(uint256)](SurgeToken.sol#L577-L602):
	External calls:
	- [(successful) = address(seller).call{gas: 40000,value: amountBNB}()](SurgeToken.sol#L591)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [_balances[seller] = _balances[seller].sub(tokenAmount,sender does not have this amount to sell)](SurgeToken.sol#L594)
	[SurgeToken._balances](SurgeToken.sol#L484) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [SurgeToken._transferFrom(address,address,uint256)](SurgeToken.sol#L535-L551)
	- [SurgeToken.balanceOf(address)](SurgeToken.sol#L504)
	- [SurgeToken.constructor()](SurgeToken.sol#L496-L501)
	- [SurgeToken.getValueOfHoldings(address)](SurgeToken.sol#L620-L622)
	- [SurgeToken.mint(address,uint256)](SurgeToken.sol#L610-L613)
	- [_totalSupply = _totalSupply.sub(tokenAmount)](SurgeToken.sol#L596)
	[SurgeToken._totalSupply](SurgeToken.sol#L482) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [SurgeToken._transferFrom(address,address,uint256)](SurgeToken.sol#L535-L551)
	- [SurgeToken.calculatePrice()](SurgeToken.sol#L605-L607)
	- [SurgeToken.constructor()](SurgeToken.sol#L496-L501)
	- [SurgeToken.mint(address,uint256)](SurgeToken.sol#L610-L613)
	- [SurgeToken.purchase(address,uint256)](SurgeToken.sol#L554-L574)
	- [SurgeToken.totalSupply()](SurgeToken.sol#L503)

detectors.description:
SurgeToken.purchase(address,uint256) (SurgeToken.sol#554-574) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- tokensToSend = nShouldPurchase.mul(spreadDivisor).div(10 ** 2) (SurgeToken.sol#564)
	- nShouldPurchase = _totalSupply.mul(bnbAmount).div(prevBNBAmount) (SurgeToken.sol#562)
detectors.markdown:
[SurgeToken.purchase(address,uint256)](SurgeToken.sol#L554-L574) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [tokensToSend = nShouldPurchase.mul(spreadDivisor).div(10 ** 2)](SurgeToken.sol#L564)
	- [nShouldPurchase = _totalSupply.mul(bnbAmount).div(prevBNBAmount)](SurgeToken.sol#L562)

detectors.description:
SurgeToken.sell(uint256) (SurgeToken.sol#577-602) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- tokensToSwap = tokenAmount.mul(sellFee).div(10 ** 2) (SurgeToken.sol#585)
	- amountBNB = tokensToSwap.mul(calculatePrice()) (SurgeToken.sol#588)
detectors.markdown:
[SurgeToken.sell(uint256)](SurgeToken.sol#L577-L602) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [tokensToSwap = tokenAmount.mul(sellFee).div(10 ** 2)](SurgeToken.sol#L585)
	- [amountBNB = tokensToSwap.mul(calculatePrice())](SurgeToken.sol#L588)

detectors.description:
SurgeToken.purchase(address,uint256) (SurgeToken.sol#554-574) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- prevBNBAmount == 0 (SurgeToken.sol#560)
detectors.markdown:
[SurgeToken.purchase(address,uint256)](SurgeToken.sol#L554-L574) uses a dangerous strict equality:
